name: Becoming a Dandelion Spore
description:
.

This Is A Difficult Game.
But It Is A Beautiful Game.
Challenge Now.
You Challenge.
Play Right Away.

To become a flower, numerous seeds take the wind and move away.
You are the wind.
You can.
Have a good fortune.
I appreciate it.

  • Drag your mouse in the direction of the wind.
  • The flowers will fly in the drag direction.
  • Please go to the end.
  • If a conflict occurs, start over.

.
